title: Error does not make sense for using BCs with a fully Fourier domain

content.raw: The error message that you receive when using BCs with a fully Fourier domain is probably not the most helpful. While there is a helpful message given in pencils.py (L90), another error is raised first. Instead of receiving a message about not setting boundary conditions, you receive, "LHS operator {} is coupled along direction {}" from operators.py (L1185).
